import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {ChristianCards} from '../../Products/ChristianCards' import GetQuotePop from '../../Popups/GetQuotePopups/GetQuotePop' import "./index.css" export default function ProductChristian() { const params = useParams() const item = ChristianCards.find((element) => element.id=== parseInt(params.id) ) const [buttonPopup, setbuttonPopup] = useState(false) return (
